properties.entry:
Version 1b3:

  • ADDED run on startup via registry (windows)
  • ADDED finances as an optional feature
  • ADDED earning report in finances

Version 1b2:

  • ADDED report caching
  • ADDED multitag support
  • ADDED view project report by double clicking
  • ADDED custom ui design
  • CHANGED overview report into dashboard
  • CHANGED logging granularity to 15 seconds
  • CHANGED AFK timeout unit to minutes
  • MOVED data actions to control panel
NOTE: Data format has been updated. If you migrated from v1b1, all categories
and config data will be reset. If you make a new Project in v1b2+, project data
format will be updated and is no longer compatible with v1b1.

Version 1b1:

  • FIXED reporting bug showing only one day and month
  • ADDED edit and delete project function
  • ADDED loading bar and background task
  • ADDED tabbed interface
  • ADDED privacy control

Version 1b:

initial closed beta release
